code: export var sortPosts=function sortPosts(posts,sortBy){if(sortBy==="Trending"){return posts.sort(function(a,b){return b.likes.likeCount-a.likes.likeCount;});}if(sortBy==="Latest"){return posts.sort(function(a,b){return new Date(b.createdAt)-new Date(a.createdAt);});}if(sortBy==="Oldest"){return posts.sort(function(a,b){return new Date(a.createdAt)-new Date(b.createdAt);});}return posts;};
